Chi tit sn phm

T-Shirt Cotton Compact Premium l sn phm o thun hon ton mi vi nhiu s ci tin c nghin cu k lng v pht trin vi cht liu Cotton Compact cao cp. Mt chic o nn c trong t vi s a dng dng c trong mi hon cnh: i lm, i chi, cafe hay c nhng bui gp mt lch s th T-Shirt Coolmate chc chn s lm bn trn c s hi lng. n gin nhng cc nam tnh, n iu m vn thi thng

Nhng chic o ca Coolmate s dng cht liu cotton compact, mt dng cotton cht lng cao em n cho ngi mc tri nghim tuyt vi nht. "Cotton Compact" l cu tr li cho cc bn ang tm kim cho mnh mt chic o thun mc ln nhn p trai hn mt cht, bn hn v thong mt hn.

COOLMATE V NHNG CHIC O PREMIUM

4 l s ln Coolmate khng ngng ci tin v nng cp nhng sn phm ca mnh t thng 02/2019 n 6/2020. c bit vi T-Shirt Cotton Compact:

  • iu chnh vic chi lng k hn.
  • Ci tin ng may i vai o gi form.
  • iu chnh size o va vn hn & nng cp vi may c o.

V Coolmate chnh thc cho ra mt sn phm o thun khng nhn phin bn mi Premium Tshirt - vi cht liu Cotton Compact em n cho ngi mc s thong mt v thoi mi nht khi mc.

Coolmate tin bng tt c tm huyt nghin cu v ra mt, Premium Tshirt Cotton Compact s l chic o thun cotton cht lng cao m bt k chng trai no cng c trong t ca mnh.
